title: Card Table
description: card table, square, folding with swinging leg; cabriole legs, knees carved with shell motif and ball feet on all four legs; there is a drawer in one end of the table, and the top, which is covered with green felt, is dished at the corners for candles; this is the concertina type card table; the were called this when the table opened with a leg under each corner
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Eugene J. Carpenter and Olivia Carpenter Coan in memory of Mr. Eugene J. Carpenter
